name: BulletEye
description:
BulletEye is a First Person Shooter game.

Your objective is to complete the course in the least possible time and shooting the max amount of targets in their bodies or heads. Be careful to not shoot civilians because this will affect your final score.

Share the game with your friends and challenge each other for the highest score.

Let us know what you think of the game and thank you for playing it :D
